title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point:

One point is earned for stating that charging a low price is better for Beefsteak because it makes greater profit: $14 > $13.
descriptions:
Student receives 0/1 point(s)

1 point:

One point is earned for stating that charging a low price is better for Beefsteak because it makes greater profit: $14 > $13.

Student receives 1/1 point(s)

1 point:

One point is earned for stating that charging a low price is better for Beefsteak because it makes greater profit: $14 > $13.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point:

  • One point is earned for stating that Beefsteak does not have a dominant strategy. If Attaburer selects high, Beefsteak does better by selecting low ($14 > $13), and if Attaburger selects low, Beefsteak does better by selecting high($8 > $7).
descriptions:
Student receives 0/1 point(s)

Student receives 1/1 point(s)


1 point:

  • One point is earned for stating that Beefsteak does not have a dominant strategy. If Attaburer selects high, Beefsteak does better by selecting low ($14 > $13), and if Attaburger selects low, Beefsteak does better by selecting high($8 > $7).

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point:

  • One point is earned for stating that Attaburger has an incentive to break the agreement, since it can earn higher profit ($12) by charging a lower price.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point:

  • One point is earned for stating that Attaburger earns $12, and Beefsteak earns $8.
